title: Always Ready
description: Subject:  Damon Craig, Coast Guard lieutenantCurrent Status:  Always ready for action--of any kind!Mission:  Patrol his territory with vigilance. Arrest drug runners.Obstacle:  Lacey Sutherland. Irresistibly sexy. Potential smuggling suspect?Damon is accustomed to being on the lookout for illegal activity on his watch, though it's not every day he suspects a gorgeous woman. Still, when Lacey suddenly appears at the Puerto Rico bar Damon's staked out, to meet a suspected smuggler, Damon's guard is up.Unfortunately, so is his libido--way up! Lacey is up to something, and Damon's determined to uncover all her dark secrets. He's also quite ready to uncover Lacey herself. One mysterious inch at a time...
author: Joanne Rock
